changes: 🧩 Added advanced product options for grouping multiple options/features under a single product.
🎛️ A product can have pre-selected group options that are automatically included, with the option to unselect or select more.
🖨️ Added multiple receipt printing features, including Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and pre-installed system printer support.
✨ Added cloud sync option. Ebmbook Pro can sync to this Mobile POS to see live updates.
🚀 New dark theme and light theme added. The UI/UX of the app has been improved too. The menu style has been also changed.
